==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|郎|女}}

===Etymology===
/iratume<sub>1</sub>/ → /iratume/. Compound of {{m|ja|いら|tr=ira||kinship}}, {{m|ja|つ|tr=tsu|pos=genitive marker}}, and {{m|ja|女|tr=me<sub>1</sub>||female}}.

===Pronunciation===
* {{IPA|[iratsume]|lang=ja}}

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|いらつめ}}

# a familiar or friendly term for a young woman
